tasks.task: Welcome to your first day as a software engineer! Press Enter to continue.
Let's start by creating a new file for your project. Press Ctrl + Shift + A to open the 'Add New Item' dialog.
tasks.hint: Press Ctrl + Shift + A to proceed.
tasks.code: // New file dialog opened. Ready to create your first file.

tasks.task: Type 'Program.cs' as the name of your new file and press Enter to add it to your project.
Now, save your work by pressing Ctrl + S.
tasks.hint: Press Ctrl + S to save your work.

tasks.task: Let's build the project by pressing Ctrl + Shift + B.
tasks.hint: Press Ctrl + Shift + B to build the project.

tasks.task: It's time to debug the project. Press F5 to start debugging.
tasks.code: // Debug mode activated. Let's find and fix some bugs!
